meta.bestFor: High-income individuals (₹36L+ annual income) seeking a lifetime-free premium card with travel benefits, low forex markup, and never-expiring rewards
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those who can't spend ₹20,000/month to unlock lounge/golf benefits, or those seeking high reward value (0.25 RP value is low)
meta.verdict: A solid lifetime-free premium card with good travel benefits and low forex markup. The May 2024 devaluation reduced its competitiveness - base reward rate dropped and online accelerated rewards were discontinued. Best suited for high spenders who can meet the ₹20,000 monthly threshold to unlock lounge, golf, and 10X rewards. The never-expiring reward points and low 1.5% forex markup remain strong selling points.
pros: Lifetime free with zero joining and annual fees
Visa Infinite privileges including luxury hotel access
Complimentary airport, international, and railway lounge access

cons: Low reward point value (₹0.25 per point)
No airline or hotel transfer partners
May 2024 devaluation reduced reward rates significantly
Add-on card has ₹499 fee (waivable on ₹60,000 spend)

changelog.change: Major devaluation - Base rate changed from 1 point per ₹100 to 1 point per ₹150. 6X online accelerated rewards discontinued. Education, wallet load, government services no longer count towards 10X threshold. Movie benefits and lounge access require ₹20,000 monthly spend.
Fuel surcharge waiver cap to be reduced from ₹400 to ₹300
Reward structure update - 3X on spends up to ₹20,000, 10X on incremental spends above ₹20,000, 1X on utilities and insurance
